metadata.title: CVE-2014-1686 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - negligible.
metadata.description: MediaWiki 1.18.0 allows remote attackers to obtain the installation path via vectors related to thumbnail creation.

notes.note: sbeattie> paths in mediawiki package are known

criterions.comment: mediawiki package in hirsute is affected and may need fixing.
